xten.name: uploaded-docs

icon.name: add
icon.click:
<%
                                    const selectedFile = await wxfns.selectFile('.doc,.docx,.pptx,.pdf,.txt');
                                    const filename = selectedFile.name;
                                    const element = event.target.closest('.wx-xten-uploaded-docs');
                                    const mode = element.getAttribute('mode') || 'public';
                                    const result = await wxfns.upload(element, 'save-document', {name: filename, mode: mode}, selectedFile);
                                    if (result.rc != 'success') {
                                        return;
                                    }
                                    
                                    await wxfns.refresh(element);
                                %>

icon.name: delete
icon.click:
<%
                                    const element = event.target.closest('.wx-xten-uploaded-docs');
                                    const row = event.target.closest('tr');
                                    const mode = element.getAttribute('mode') || 'public';
                                    const docname = row.getAttribute('docname');
                                    const result = await wxfns.transaction(element, 'delete-document', {name: docname});
                                    if (result.rc != 'success') {
                                        return;
                                    }
                                    
                                    await wxfns.refresh(element);
                                %>

xten.load:
<%
        const body = node.findOne('tbody');
        const template = node.findOne('[name="row-template"]');
        body.empty();

        body.addChild(template);

        var value = await database.inlineValue(node, context, xten);
        var sno = 1;

        if (!value) {
            return;
        }

        const mode = node.attribs || 'private';

        for (var prop in value) {
            const tr = template.clone();
            delete tr.attribs.style;
            delete tr.attribs.name;
            tr.attribs.docname = prop;
            const snode = tr.findOne('[name="sno"]');
            snode.text = sno.toString();
            sno++;
            const dnode = tr.findOne('[name="doc-name"]');
            dnode.text = prop;
            body.addChild(tr);
        }
    %>
